body: If you are reading this then all the curses on you and on me from the previous curse comments from past and upcoming curse comment in future will get disabled If you want to share this then do and if you don't feel like sharing this then don't, as you will not get any curse ever again while watching hentai So don't share the cursed message of my mortal enenmy who wrote the cursed message enjoy a curse free hentai watching for eternity
